scripts.build: tsc && shx mkdir -p ./dist/layers/nodejs/node_modules && shx cp -r dist/src dist/layers/nodejs/node_modules && shx rm -r dist/src
scripts.deploy: cd ./dist/layers && bestzip ../layers.zip * && cd .. && bestzip functions.zip functions/* && cd ../deploy && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.sam: cd ./deploy && sam local invoke --hook-name terraform create_user_function
